Description.desc: Only vaccines in the allowed valueset that have been approved by the French Authority (Pfizer, Moderna, Astra Zeneca, Janssen, Novavax, Covishield, R-covi, Covid 19 Vaccine and some clinical trials).
Seuls les vaccins approuvés par l'ANSM sont acceptés en France (Pfizer, Moderna, Astra Zeneca, Janssen, Novavax, Covishield, R-covi, Covid 19 Vaccine et certains essais cliniques).
